description:
Ready to take your energy to the next level? Want to support your weight loss goals in a healthy way? Are you searching for a pre-workout powder filled with all-natural goodness and without the nasty stuff found in many pre-workout mixes? Happy Way’s Charge Up Pre-workout Powders are what you’re looking for! Designed for the fitness fanatics who wanna get more out of their workouts, for the coffee addicts who need their daily perk up without the caffeine crash, or even for those who are searching for a natural energy boost to keep them going throughout the day. Vegan-friendly and gluten-free, Happy Way’s Watermelon flavour is fresh and juicy—just like your favourite summer fruit!

Key benefits:
100% natural
Packed with vitamins, minerals & antioxidants
No artificial flavours, preservatives or sweeteners
Vegan-friendly
Gluten-free
Increases energy & endurance
Supports weight management 
Supports focus and performance


South Aussie health and wellness brand Happy Way have been adding flavour and fun to smoothie cups across the globe since 2015. Proudly 100% natural and packed full of goodness, Happy Way’s supplements are designed to nourish the mind and body whilst supporting you to live life to the fullest! Offering a range of nutritional products to suit all needs and dietary requirements, they’re available in a range of mouth-watering flavours guaranteed to satisfy tummies and taste buds everywhere!
name: Happy Way 300G
